author: SciShow
description:
Thanks to Henson Shaving for sponsoring this video! Head to https://hensonshaving.yt.link/d2iieCF and use code scishow to receive 100 blades for free (2+ years worth). Just make sure both products are in the cart for the code to take effect.

The great debate between microplastic shedding plastic cutting boards and bacteria harboring wooden cutting boards started with peer-reviewed science. We'll explore that research along with what scientists know about alternative cutting board materials to determine the most food safe option.

Hosted by: Hank Green (he/him)

title: Wooden Cutting Boards Are the Best
